segments.text: Over near the cabinets, I notice two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balanced rather precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks quite wobbly, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh dear, he’s reaching into a cookie jar!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s labeled “COOKIE JAR,” and it’s full of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is in the jar, and he's holding a plate with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he's stretched, it seems very dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He really should be more careful, or someone will get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His accomplice, a little girl, stands nearby, eagerly waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, clearly anticipating her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a classic act of secret cookie raiding, but with added peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't fall and break something, or themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
